channel.title: Runepact | Looking for client developer
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6QiUu.png[/img] [hr] [b]Runepact is a project that will hopefully become a great server. As in many other projects, many goals are highly dreamed of; this will lead us to our dedication of putting nothing but hard work into the server. We hope that this development thread will not only help keep our dedication strong due to the support, but also inspire others that dreams are achievable.[/b][/center] [hr]
If you would like to check out the development of Runepact, please visit the link below: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,559540.msg4088404.html#msg4088404
[b]Development Team:[/b]
[ul][li]Jaxus[/li] [li]TheProdigy[/li] [li]The Web Guy[/li][/ul] [b]We are currently looking for a client developer, so if you are interested, feel free to post below.[/b]
[hr]
If you are interested in joining the team, please post below with the following format:
[code]Which programming language do you specialize in? Why are you interested in this project? Will you be dedicated and support other team members? Will you follow all regulations defined once and if you are accepted onto the team?[/code]

item.title: Runepact | Looking for client developer
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Which programming language do you specialize in? Python, Java.
Why are you interested in this project? This project is pretty organized. I’m pretty bored. Why not Join?
Will you be dedicated and support other team members? Sure.
Will you follow all regulations defined once and if you are accepted onto the team? Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | Looking for client developer
item.dc:creator: @xElite xElite
item.description:
@xElite wrote:

Which programming language do you specialize in? Java HTML, Gfxing Ps cs5
Why are you interested in this project? I want to see this server be a success and try perfection
Will you be dedicated and support other team members? Yes i will, i work well with people
Will you follow all regulations defined once and if you are accepted onto the team?Yes, i’ll follow ever rule and instruction given

Read full topic

item.title: Runepact | Looking for client developer
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

[quote=“The Web Guy, post:2, topic:456224”]Which programming language do you specialize in? PHP (Also know HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Ajax)
Why are you interested in this project? I like to help out people and it seems like a nice project.
Will you be dedicated and support other team members? Yes of course, that’s the point of the Development team.
Will you follow all regulations defined once and if you are accepted onto the team? Yes, fine by me.[/quote]
I’d be glad to invite you to the team as the web developer. I have a great environment you can work in, so hopefully you will enjoy that. Also, do you have any other means of communication besides Moparscape?

Also, I meant to post this in server development, so I’m just going to move the bit about the skills to the developer section. Sorry

Read full topic
